cyclone.name: ROSLYN
cyclone.current_location: about 175 mi (280 km) south of Zihuatanejo, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west-northwest, then forecast to bend northwest and north-northwest, paralleling the Pacific coast of southwestern and west-central Mexico and making landfall there this weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southwestern or west-central Pacific coast of Mexico (near the states of Colima/Jalisco)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Pacific coast of southwestern and west-central Mexico; no impact expected along the Gulf coast near Brownsville, TX
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: N/A (Brownsville not listed in wind-probability table)
weather_observation.wind: None – tropical-storm-force winds are not forecast anywhere near Brownsville, TX
weather_observation.storm_surge: None – system remains on Pacific side of Mexico
weather_observation.rainfall: None – any heavy rain will stay well south and west over Pacific-side Mexico
